ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(RecordTypeId = "0129s0000004IoG") && ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Outlet_Activity__r.Activity__c, "47302") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "8") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "90") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "3") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "21") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "151") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "152") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "2") || ISPICKVAL(Service__c, "98"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case has the Outlet Activity TEI Community Support. The Service must be: Advocacy, Business Planning, Edu and Skills, Indigenous Advocacy/Support or Healing Workshops, Information/Advice/Referral, Social Participation.
